Title: Brutal Prey
Description:
This land is crawling with opportunities for a skilled hunter. We want you to join the hunt. 

Some threats are feral. Dare I say it, some are greatest threats are sentient and malevolent. If we all work together, we can make the Reach a safe haven, as it used to be.
ObjectivesText: Hunt down elite creatures across the Forbidden Reach.

Objectives.Text: Elite creatures slain in Forbidden Reach
